item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:14, topic:458740"][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=561649.msg4096948#msg4096948 date=1346967696]

2 more questions for ya database connection, registration? And mining doesn’t work on the source keeps telling me nothing interesting happens?
[/quote]None of those are questions… Even if I try to turn them into questions, they make absolutely no sense.

He’s simply asking about how to register an character, and why mining doesn’t work?[/quote]The first entirely depends on which storage medium he’s using… With the default you just log in.

Mining should work once I accept a pull request.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Don’t change the bat files and just run them…

You don’t need to do anything else.

Or you can actually read the README…

Anyway, the ls.jar is not a runnable jar, so you can’t do “java -jar ls.jar”.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @angels0fdeath01 angels0fdeath01
item.description:
@angels0fdeath01 wrote:

Update:
So i’ve tried

ant runls
result: Target “runls” does not exist in the project LoginServer

java -jar ls.jar
result: Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from ls.jar

Most of the command line i add to the runls.bat file throw the first error at me. Anyone have an answer.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Why does it matter if it compiles before it runs?

Anyway, the game and login servers have the correct files to run it…

If on windows, use the bat files, and if you’re on Linux, use the shell files.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

hey but Loging server had runls.bat already… did you delete it?

@echo off java -cp build;lib/slf4j.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/mysql-connector.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/mina.jar org.moparscape.msc.ls.Server pause exit

and ant run

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @angels0fdeath01 angels0fdeath01
item.description:
@angels0fdeath01 wrote:

Now i just get an error when running the ls.jar (Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribut from ls.jar.)

Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic Question
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Like always try to read the build.xml file.

for compiling and building the jar ant jar

for running the server java -jar MoparClassic.jar or ant run-jar

Read full topic
